Message:
As I felt myself
collapse from shock,

She gave me a gentle smile...
then approached Her Holiness.

“Fortina is the one
who saved my life...

There’s no way she’s a witch
who would bring about disasters!”

Florence did her best to
gain Her Holiness’s favor
on my behalf.

Thank you, Florence...
It means so much
just to hear you say that...

I felt as if a strange light flickered
from Her Holiness’s lance.
scoffing as soon as our eyes met...

She then handed Florence
a sword, and said to her...

“That witch conjured
the disease that brought
you to the brink of death.
